features.name: Authentication
features.description: OAuth authentication with Spotify and TikTok providers using NextAuth v5

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard page for authenticated users to manage live sessions

features.name: Live Session Panel
features.description: Real-time display of TikTok live session status and song request queue

features.name: Session Controls
features.description: Controls to start/stop live streaming sessions and manage queue

features.name: WebSocket Hook
features.description: Custom React hook for WebSocket connection to backend for real-time updates

features.name: Toast Notifications
features.description: Toast notification system using Radix UI

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Public landing page with sign-in options

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI primitives

features.name: Database Schema
features.description: Drizzle ORM schema for PostgreSQL with users, sessions, accounts, and queue tables

features.name: Structured Logging
features.description: JSON-formatted structured logging for production debugging
